Get instant access to exclusive veteran benefits, discounts, and specialized courses. Quick, secure, and confidential verification process.

Verification Information

Learn about our secure verification process, accepted documents, and who's eligible for veteran benefits.

Who Can Apply

Veterans
All honorably discharged U.S. military veterans
Active Duty
Currently serving active duty service members
Reservists
National Guard and Reserve members
Military Spouses
Spouses of active duty, veteran, or deceased service members

Accepted Documents

DD-214 (Discharge Papers)
Most Common
Certificate of Release or Discharge from Active Duty
VA ID Card
Recommended
Department of Veterans Affairs identification card
Military ID Card
Active/Reserve
Active duty, reserve, or retired military ID
NGB-22 (Guard/Reserve)
Guard/Reserve
National Guard Bureau Form 22 for Guard/Reserve members

Verification Process

1
Choose Document Type
Select the type of military document you'll be uploading
2
Upload Document
Securely upload a clear photo or scan of your document
3
Verification Review
Our team reviews your submission (usually within 24 hours)
4
Access Benefits
Once approved, immediately access all veteran benefits
Security & Privacy

Encrypted Storage

All documents are encrypted and stored securely

Quick Processing

Most verifications completed within 24 hours

HIPAA Compliant

Meets all federal privacy requirements
